dict.acceptation: 量，数量；定量，大批；数目；[语音学、韵律学]音量（指元音或音节的长短）；

sent.orig: Quantity principle: The good work quantity is the assurance of our quantity.
sent.trans: 质量理念：良好的工作质量是我们质量的保证。

sent.orig: Statistical technique is a necessary tool in quantity analysis, quantity control and improvement of quantity.
sent.trans: 统计技术是质量管理中进行质量分析、质量控制和质量改进的必要工具。

sent.orig: Large quantity of pathogen of the autumn seedlings will increase the pathogen quantity in over-wintering seedlings.
sent.trans: 小麦秋苗带菌量大，则翌春病菌越冬菌源量也大。

sent.orig: The squeezing quantity maintenance is invariable, therefore the cake and soybean oil S&D quantity maintains invariably.
sent.trans: 压榨量维持不变，所以豆粕和豆油S&D数量均维持不变。

sent.orig: Please quote Order Minimum Quantity and Color Minimum Quantity.
sent.trans: 请报最低数量和颜色为最低起订量。
